Text: Cheers mate. Love this film, I watched this film being made when I was 12, Some of my friends were extras. Can't wait to watch it. Will keep this seeding.

Thanks for this Dickens classic.
A 9/10
V 8.5/10

TYVM rambam! Surprised to see this was the only compressed copy (not 4.6gb) out there, but very grateful you have put one up. :)

This is a great movie and my mom has been asking to watch it. She owns a copy, but it's a vhs and neither she nor I have a working vcr. haha :)

Merry Christmas and God Bless
